term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - redox ion exchangers
term.title: redox ion exchangers

item.text: Conventional ion exchangers in which reversible redox couples have been introduced as counter-ions either by sorption or complex formation. They closely resemble redox polymers in their behaviour.

item.title: counter-ions (in an ion exchanger, in colloid chemistry)
counter-ions (in an ion exchanger, in colloid chemistry)
redox polymers (in an ion exchanger, in colloid chemistry)
